credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 106 x 29.5 cm (41 3/4 x 11 5/8 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique: cross, satin, stem and knot stitches on plain weave
description: Cross borders containing geometric and floral patterns, alphabets, numerals; in panel are two medallions with initials "MDF" and "ISG" and the date "1757."  Also features Crucifixion, Pascal Lamb, St. George and the Dragon and various animals.
name: Sampler
